page.title: 05LOCAL SPORT.
page.content:
{SHINTY { One of the main pastimes in this area is shinty.The shinty stick is called a Caman.The Caman has a triangular shaped head.It is played with twelve players in each team.To start the match the centres from the two teams hold their camans above their heads.
The referee throws the ball up in the air next to the Camans and they try to hit it in the other players half.They are allowed to swing their Camans higher than their shoulders.Every time somebody scores the referee throws the ball up in the air in the centre of the field then they try to hit the ball.
